name: Personal Fatique Mats
descr:
TuliGEL Personal Fatique Mats have been scientifically and medically designed to protect your feet from hard, unyielding surfaces. The unique tic-tac-toe soft waffle pattern interrupts the shock waves created while walking our running, helping to prevent fatique, tired, swollen, aching feet and backache. If yor work on hard concrete surfaces, TuliGEL Personal Fatique Mats can make a real difference in how you feel.

One size fits all.
